entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h early this evening except gusting to 60 near the water overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 70 near the water in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon then becoming west 30 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low zero.
